reason: Validation review complete. Steps 8-9 done. Found 2 actionable naming inconsistencies in coordinator-subagent-templates.instructions.md (convert_to_skill should be convert; protected missing from classification list). Recommend Revisionist for quick fixes."

data.findings_summary: NAMING-1 [medium]: coordinator-subagent-templates.instructions.md uses 'convert_to_skill' (lines 171, 200, 206) but agent file and instruction file both use 'convert'. Fix: change to 'convert' in 3 places. NAMING-2 [low]: coordinator template classification list (lines 170-174) omits 'protected'. Fix: add one line. NAMING-3 [low]: consolidate/delete combined vs separate — cosmetic, no fix needed. SCOPE-1 [low]: template scope narrower than instruction scan paths — cosmetic, no fix needed.

specific_fixes.add: - protected — agent definitions, security files — never touched
